changelog: fix: Critical bug fixes + ChatGPT-style project view - (1) Fixed 'conversations is not defined' error by adding missing variable to destructuring (app/page.tsx:95). (2) Exposed setCurrentConversationId from useConversations hook for external use. (3) Implemented full ChatGPT-style project detail view: clicking project in sidebar now shows project header with icon, conversation count, and grid of all project conversations with titles, timestamps, summaries. (4) Added project-specific keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+P clears conversation). (5) Empty state when project has no conversations. Fixes runtime errors and implements major requested feature. ~80 lines added.

mcp.reason: 66% failure rate, zero unique value vs existing RAG system

archie2.reason: Over-engineered. Simple git-based version works better

coreFeatures.rag: AutoReferenceButler - 626 lines of intelligent context gathering
coreFeatures.semanticSearch: RAG Search System - 602 lines with hybrid vector+keyword search
coreFeatures.embeddings: Embedding Cache - 445 lines with 80-90% hit rate
coreFeatures.knowledgeGraph: Knowledge Graph - 553 lines with entity/relationship tracking
coreFeatures.database: pgvector with HNSW indexes for fast similarity search
coreFeatures.archie: Simple git-based maintenance - 466 lines, hourly cron, auto-commits fixes
